subScenes.name: 开场问候
subScenes.description: 项目经理向总监礼貌开场并确认议程

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi Sarah, thanks for making time today. Ready to walk through Q2 progress?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，莎拉，谢谢您抽出时间，我们开始讲Q2进展吧？

responses.text: Absolutely, let's dive in. I've got the key metrics ready.
responses.text_cn: 当然，我们开始吧，关键数据我都准备好了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短回应表达准备就绪，自然推进对话

subScenes.name: 进度汇报
subScenes.description: 汇报项目核心进展与关键成果

qaPairs.speakerText: So far, we're 85% on track—delayed a bit on the UX phase, but dev's caught up.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 目前我们进度85%，UI/UX稍有延迟，但开发团队已经追回来了。

responses.text: We're ahead on backend delivery and hit all sprint goals. UX delay was minor and already mitigated.
responses.text_cn: 后端提前交付，冲刺目标全部达成，UI延迟已解决。

responses.text: Pretty good overall—UX slipped but we're back on schedule now.
responses.text_cn: 整体不错，UI虽慢了点，但现在赶上了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用数据支撑汇报，突出解决能力

subScenes.name: 应对提问
subScenes.description: 回应总监关于预算和风险的质询

qaPairs.speakerText: How's the budget holding up? I heard the vendor costs spiked last month.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 预算情况怎么样？我听说上个月供应商费用涨了。

responses.text: We're at 92% of forecast—spent more on cloud infra but saved on freelance hires. Net neutral.
responses.text_cn: 预算用了92%，云服务超支但省了外包费，总体持平。

responses.text: A bit over, but we're adjusting next quarter.
responses.text_cn: 稍微超了，下季度会调整。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用数据回应预算质疑，展现控制力

qaPairs.speakerText: Any major risks we should flag before Q3?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: Q3前有什么重大风险需要提前预警吗？

responses.text: Yes—dependency on Vendor X’s API. We’ve got a backup plan ready if they delay.
responses.text_cn: 有，依赖Vendor X的API，我们已备好备用方案。

responses.text: Nothing critical, but we're watching Vendor X.
responses.text_cn: 没大问题，但我们在盯供应商X。

qaPairs.usageNote: 风险回应要具体+有预案，体现专业度

subScenes.name: 资源请求
subScenes.description: 提出下一阶段所需的资源支持

qaPairs.speakerText: For Q3, we’ll need one more dev and a UX designer to hit the launch deadline.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: Q3我们需要再加一名开发和一名UI设计师才能按时上线。

responses.text: I can reallocate Maria from the legacy project—she’s got the right skills. Can we start next Monday?
responses.text_cn: 我可以从旧项目调Maria过来，她很合适，下周一开始行吗？

responses.text: Yeah, we can probably move someone. Let me check availability.
responses.text_cn: 行，应该能调人，我查下档期。

qaPairs.usageNote: 资源请求要具体+建议方案，提高通过率

subScenes.name: 结束道别
subScenes.description: 总结要点并礼貌结束汇报

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks for the feedback—any final thoughts before we wrap up?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢反馈，收尾前还有没有其他建议？

responses.text: Looks solid. Keep me posted on Vendor X. Great work overall.
responses.text_cn: 不错，继续关注供应商X，整体做得很好。

responses.text: All good. Thanks for the update!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短积极反馈收尾，留下专业印象
